text:
Proclamation under the Duties Act 2001

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 227(1)(d) of the Duties Act 2001 â€“

        (a) amend the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 2001, No. 76, by omitting subparagraph (va) of paragraph (a); and
        (b) declare that this proclamation takes effect on 1 July 2013.
26 June 2013

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

S. BACON

Minister for Finance

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 28 June 2013

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
